text: Without Britain's tolerance German rearmament in the air would be jeopardised: When Hoesch's reports, along with other nazi documents, were captured and lished after the war the pattern of British Government connivance became clear. At nazi Germany's request, Britain was providing the cloak for Germany to build an air force bigger than that of France.
